metadata.title: CVE-2023-36808 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: GLPI is a free asset and IT management software package. Starting inversion 0.80 and prior to version 10.0.8, Computer Virtual Machine form andGLPI inventory request can be used to perform a SQL injection attack.Version 10.0.8 has a patch for this issue. As a workaround, one may disablenative inventory.

criterions.comment: glpi package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
